name: OriginsRO
description: Downloads the latest version of OriginsRO. Please note an account is required to play: create one at http://originsro.org/join
content:
files:
- client: https://dl.originsro.org/client/OriginsRO-full-2020-03-05.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/OriginsroLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: client
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: ie8
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: DirectDrawRenderer
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: opengl
